prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Pipe, Guitar, Synth Pad, Drums, Piano, but without Bass.
captions:
Style 1:
This track features the sounds of a Pipe, Guitar, Synth Pad, Drums, and Piano, but without the Bass.

Style 2:
This song is composed of a Pipe, Guitar, Synth Pad, Drums, and Piano, omitting the Bass.

Style 3:
The Pipe, Guitar, Synth Pad, Drums, and Piano are all present in this song, but the Bass is absent.
